RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OVER A MILE SINCE JANUARY 12, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $1 2,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXPLOSIVELY HOT tracked in the two path, ranged up outside of the leading pair and in the four path around the far turn to bid at the quarter pole, then drove clear approaching the furlong grounds. ISOLATION was unruly while reluctant to load, stalked along the inside, vacated the rail turning for home to surpass the tiring early pace setter while aiming inside of the newly leading top pair, sustained a rail bid inside the final furlong, but was fended off. BELLAMY CAY was last away, rushed forward four wide into the first turn to achieve a two wide stalking position around it, bid for the lead entering the far turn, vied between horses as the eventual winner loomed a danger turning for home, got outkicked entering the lane, and yielded between horses leaving the furlong grounds. MY LITTLE JEN trailed off of the rail around both turns, shifted outside of tiring rivals entering the final furlong, and surpassed them late. HEART THAT BINDS tracked three wide, got floated four to five wide around the far turn, and faded. CALAJA set a clear pace in the two path around the first turn, vied inside of a pair of bidders around the far turn, and weakened approaching the quarter pole. THE SEVEN FURLONG FRACTION WAS OMITTED AND IS PENDING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Jen
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, shifted out 1/8, passed tired rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Isolation
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly loading, stalked ins, 2wd btw1/4, rail bid 1/8, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Explosively Hot
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, ranged up 3w2nd, bid 4p1/4, cleared 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Heart That Binds
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3wd, 4-5wd 2nd, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Calaja
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear 2p, met bid 3/8, ins pair 2nd, wknd 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Bellamy Cay
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, stalked 4-2w1st, bid 3/8, vied btw2nd, yielded 1/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR FOUR YEAR OLDS. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CO CONSPIRATOR set the pace in the two path, showed the way from a pressing foe around the far turn, shook free of him in upper stretch, dug in to resist another outer rival's bid entering the final sixteenth, and gamely clung to a margin to the wire. BONUS APPRECIATION trailed along the inside, improved to a tracking position down the backstretch, pursued the leaders two wide around the far turn, split them three wide entering the lane, took aim on a clear CO CONSPIRATOR at the sixteenth pole, bid and sparred through the late stages, but was denied. MAGAZINE STREET broke in and brushed a rival at the start, tracked outside of the top pair and from the four path, but was outkicked by an inner rival while floated to the five path entering the lane, chased while flopping back to his left lead at the furlong grounds, and ran on to reach show. UNCLE NICK was brushed by an outer rival at the start, stalked outside of the pace setter, pressed that foe around the far turn, but failed to keep pace while chasing on his left lead and between horses in upper stretch, and yielded in the final furlong. MAD ADAM broke a beat slow, lacked speed while floated to the three to five path around the first turn, trailed soon after, and improved in upper stretch. ANICLUDE was bumped by an outer rival at the start, laid off of the pace along the inside, shifted out to the five path nearing the backstretch, but failed to respond to urging down it, bore out turning for home, and made little impact. KIDYOUNOT broke in and bumped a rival at the start, stalked along the inside, and faded around the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Aniclude
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, off pace ins, 5p3/4, bore out 5/16, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Kidyounot
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in/bumped foe start, stalked inside, faded 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Co Conspirator
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2p,ins foe 2nd,shook free upr,dug in1/16,dueld,game,held

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Nick
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushd st,stalkd 2w-3p,press 2nd,chasd btw upr,left ld,yield 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Magazine Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in/brush foe,trackd 3w-4p,outkickd 4w1/4,flop lds1/8,no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Adam
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slow, off pace 3-5p1st, trailed, passed tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bonus Appreciation
ENTRY.OWNER: JD Thoroughbreds LLC Davis Joey Keith and Romero Larry J
ENTRY.COMMENT: trail ins,track 9/16,2w2nd,split 3w1/4,rally,bid 1/16,duel,denied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 52000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $13,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, WAIVER CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $50,000 (Races Where Entered For $35,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RICHEBOURG pressed the leader from the four path, vied in the three path around the far turn, led entering the lane, and kicked clear. CHARDONNAY stalked the top pair from the five path, chased them from the four path around the far turn, then ran on one while one paced to claim place at the sixteenth pole. LADY JEOPARDY set the pace in the two path, dueled with an outer bidder around the far turn, but was headed entering the lane, and weakened through the final furlong. HANNAH'S HAVEN broke a step slow and bumped an outer rival at the start, saved ground while tracking, but to no avail. SHE A HOT MESS took a bump from an inner rival at the start, laid off of the pace two wide, and made little impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jeopardy
ENTRY.OWNER: Salome Robert Joseph and Salome Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2p, ins winner 2nd, headed 1/4, wknd 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Richebourg
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd-4p vied 3p2nd, led 4p1/4, kicked clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: W C Racing, Milt Gilman & Mark Verge

ENTRY.NAME: Hannah's Haven
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow/bump start, tracked inside, saved ground, no avail

ENTRY.NAME: She a Hot Mess
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, off pace 2wd, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Chardonnay
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd-5p, chased 4p2nd, one paced, up place 1/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 81. Allowance Purse 52000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUE LALA stalked the top pair from the two path, tipped outside of them to take aim in upper stretch, then kicked past them at the furlong grounds. GIGABLAST bumped with an outer rival at the start, laid off of the pace in the two to three paths, chased from behind the leading group through upper stretch, tipped three wide nearing the final sixteenth, and surged late to reach place at the wire. SUMITUP pressed two wide, vied around the turn, led briefly entering the lane, but relinquished the advantage in upper stretch, got outkicked by an outer rival at the furlong grounds, battled for place through the late stages, but was nailed by an outer oncharging foe for that position at the wire. WUPKAR set the pace along the inside, vied with an outer rival around the turn, dueled through upper stretch, but was outkicked by a wider bidder at the furlong grounds, fought on gamely for place thereafter, but was outfinished by a pair of rivals. HEI HEI CUSTIVITY broke a step slowly before bumping with an inner rival at the start, rushed forward, tracked three wide and between horses around the turn, but yielded in upper stretch. NONEYA chased from midpack three to four wide in to the turn, then faded five wide entering the lane. VIOLA STAR was outrun. FLASHYBOY'S LILSIS showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Gigablast
ENTRY.OWNER: Warren Andrew N and Warren Rania
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start,off pace 2-3p,rail chase,3w1/16,rallied,up place wire

ENTRY.NAME: Hei Hei Custivity
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow/bump start, rushed, tracked 3wd btw, yield upr

ENTRY.NAME: Viola Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Wupkar
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace,ins foe turn,dueled,outkicked 1/8,place duel,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Flashyboy's Lilsis
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Rue Lala
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked ins-2p, took aim 3wd upper, bid 1/8, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Noneya
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased midpack 3wd, 4wd turn, faded 5w1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Sumitup
ENTRY.COMMENT: press 2wd,vied turn,brief lead1/4,btw3/16,outkckd 1/8,naild place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 98. Starter Allowance Purse 35000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $20,000 OR LESS IN 2021 - 2023. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since November 12 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMERALD FOREST stalked the pace setter from the four path, bid at the three furlong pole, led turning for home, drew clear at the quarter pole, inched away leaving the furlong grounds, and held sway from an outer chaser late. ALL WEST laid off of the pace in the four path, tipped to the six path and outside of foes entering the lane, rallied to take aim on the clear leader in the final sixteenth, but failed to menace late. PRADO'S PRIORITY broke in and bumped a rival at the start, set the pace in the two path, vied with an outer rival around the turn, but was headed turning for home, fought on through upper stretch, but gave way leaving the furlong grounds. CRIME SPREE tracked four wide, pressed three wide while hung in the five path around the turn, but failed to keep pace with the top pair entering the lane, and yielded between horses. DEVIL'S TOWER was bumped by an outer rival into an inner foe at the start, lacked speed in the three path, and made little impact. GORMLEYS GOT GAME took a bump from an outer rival at the start, stalked along the inside while just off of the rail around the turn, then gave way while hanging on his left lead.

ENTRY.NAME: Gormleys Got Game
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, stalked ins-2p, gave way, left lead

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Tower
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped btwn start, off pace 3p, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Prado's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in/bump st,set pace 2p,ins winner turn,headed5/16,gave way1/8

ENTRY.NAME: All West
ENTRY.OWNER: JD Thoroughbreds LLC and Davis Joey Keith
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 6p1/4, rallied, took aim late, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Forest
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2wd-4p, bid 3/8, led 5/16, cleared 1/4, inched away 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Crime Spree
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 4wd, pressed 3wd-5p turn, outpaced 1/4, yielded btwn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 80. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Their Last 3 Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAJUN CRAZY stalked the top pair from the four path, prompted into the far turn, bid at the quarter pole, led entering the lane, and held sway through the closing stages. SLICK AND FAST tracked along the inside, pulled to the pocket down the backstretch, vacated the rail turning for home to surpass a tiring rival, then sustained a rail bid in the final furlong, but was kept at bay before saving place. I DON'T VENMO bumped with an outer rival at the start, laid off of the pace in the four path and between horses, pursued the main group from the three path around the far turn, then chased from between horses through midstretch, stayed on in the late stages, and missed reaching place. ANDERS SMILE prompted the pace two wide, vied between horses around the far turn, but failed to match strides with his outer counterpart entering the lane, and yielded between horses in the late stages. CAJUN CONNECTION stalked in the two path, then from between horses down the backstretch, chased before shifting to the five path entering the lane, and ran on while hanging on his left lead. ALLNIGHT MOONLIGHT bumped an outer rival at the start, settled off of the pace while hung in the five path, inched closer under an all-out drive around the far turn, then tired through the final furlong. MAIN DUDE set the pace, but was headed by a pair of outer rivals around the far turn, and weakened turning for home. INSPECTOR ED trailed while tucking from the seven path to the two path around the first turn, and never got involved. UP N GONE raced at the rear in the six path around the first turn, and got outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Slick and Fast
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, stalked 9/16, 2w1/4, rail bid 1/8, denied

ENTRY.NAME: Anders Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 2wd, vied btwn 2nd, outkicked 3/16, yielded btwn late

ENTRY.NAME: Main Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ins pair 2nd, wknd 1/4

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2p, btwn 9/16, 5p3/16, left lead, ran on

ENTRY.OWNER: Robison J Kirk and Robison Judy
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start,off pace 4pbtw,3p2nd,chased btw,stayed on,missed place

ENTRY.COMMENT: bump start, off pace 5p, inched closer/urged 2nd, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Up N Gone
ENTRY.COMMENT: rear 6p1st, 2w2nd, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Crazy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3wd-4p, prompt 2nd, bid 1/4, led 3/16, held sway

ENTRY.NAME: Inspector Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, 7-2p1st, never involved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 52000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since December 12 Allowed 3 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE CHEESE tracked in the two path, then two wide and from between horses into the far turn, tipped outside of them turning for home, ranged up in the five path entering the lane, rallied to catch the clear leader in the final sixteenth, and drew clear. FORTY THREE set the pace along the inside, shook clear entering the lane, but was worn down by an outer rival in the late stages. MARTINIZED tracked in the three path, then three wide around the far turn, but was outkicked by an outer rival nearing the furlong grounds, and chased the to pair home. WOODS N WATER stalked along the inside, and chased through the lane while lacking a bid. GUITARTUITION PLZZ was briefly fractious in the gates, trailed around both turns, shifted out in the final furlong, and failed to factor. WICKED ROSE pressed two wide, vied around the far turn, but weakened between horses entering the lane. BATTLE OF WILL laid off of the pace in the four path, got floated to the five path around the far turn before bearing to the nine path entering the lane, and got outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Guitartuition Plzz
ENTRY.COMMENT: briefly fractious gate, trailed, shifted out 1/8, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Cheese
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, 2wd btw2nd, 4w1/4, 5p3/16, rallied, bid 1/16, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Woods N Water
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, rail chase, no bid

ENTRY.NAME: Forty Three
ENTRY.OWNER: Roe Steve D and Roe Patricia L
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace ins, shook clear 3/16, worn down late

ENTRY.NAME: Martinized
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 3p, 3w2nd, outkicked 1/8, chased

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Will
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 5p1/4, 9p3/16, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, vied 2nd, wknd btwn 3/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 8 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 124 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $50,000 In Their Last 3 Starts). (If deemed inadvisable by management to run this race over the turf course, it will be r un on the main track at One Mile and One Sixteenth.) (Rail at 34 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYTOWN MYRULES set the pace while well in hand, drew off turning for home, widened under driving pressure while hanging on her left lead through midstretch, then changed over at the sixteenth pole, and was put to wraps soon after. SOLIDARITY stalked two to three wide, bid for place outside of LAYLA'S SONG entering the lane, but lugged in and bumped that rival at the three sixteenths pole, sustained a duel for that position through the final furlong, and narrowly prevailed. LAYLA'S SONG tracked two wide, split the leaders to bid at the five furlong pole, pressed into the far turn, but yielded approaching the five sixteenths pole, met an outer challenge for place entering the lane, took a bump from that foe in upper stretch, yet prevailed in the duel for that position thereafter. SUPER COOL STORM got rank passing the wire for the first time, remained keen behind the leaders around the first turn, got wrangled back to trail entering the backstretch, and was outrun thereafter. THE MILE FRACTION WAS OMITTED AND IS PENDING REVIEW.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Cool Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: rank early, keen 1st, wrangled back 3/4, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Layla's Song
ENTRY.OWNER: Johnson Kenneth W and Woodson Clinton J
ENTRY.COMMENT: track 2w,bid btw5/8,pressd,yield 5/16,dug in plc/bumpd 3/16,naild

ENTRY.NAME: Solidarity
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 2-3wd, place bid 1/4, lug/bump 3/16, place duel, just up

ENTRY.NAME: Mytown Myrules
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace in hand,drew off5/16,driving,left lead,changed1/16,wraps

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FAIR GROUNDS RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 15000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JULY 12, 2022. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 12 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4 ,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility And Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRACIDA moved about just before the gates opened causing him to spot the field multiple lengths at the start, lagged behind around the turn, shifted out to the eight path in midstretch, then rallied to surge past the clear leader in the closing stages. MR. PRODUCTION broke out, tracked the top trio from the five path, rallied to drive past those rivals at the furlong grounds, kicked clear entering the final sixteenth as the rider searched for competition, but offered little resistance to an outer oncharging rival's late blitz nearing the wire. C'MON VE tracked along the inside, shifted three wide at the furlong grounds after MR PRODUCTION got a jump, claimed place in pursuit of that foe entering the final sixteenth, but was outkicked late. MR. PRIORITY laid off of the pace in the four path, tipped to the six path entering the lane, and moved up in the final furlong while getting outkicked by an outer foe. CRUSADER EXPRESS raced off of the pace in the three path and between horses, and failed to menace among foes. QUEST FOR AVETTE prompted the pace two wide and between horses while taking the turn in the three path, led coming to the furlong grounds, but was outkicked leaving that juncture, and faltered. LOVEU AND PROUDOFU took a bump from an outer rival at the start, pressed the top pair from the four path, but weakened between horses in upper strech. LT. BONURA lacked speed two wide, and failed to factor. REECE'S PRIORITY set the pace inside of a pair of pressers while a path off of the inner railing around the turn, got headed in upper stretch, and weakened through the final furlong. COUNTERFEIT bobbled and bumped an inner rival at the start, laid off of the pace along the inside, and failed to factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Reece's Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2p, ins pair turn, wknd 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Counterfeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled/bump start, off pace inside, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: C'Mon Ve
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, chased 3w1/8, up place 1/16, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Gracida
ENTRY.COMMENT: off poorly, lagged behind, 8p1/8, surged late, up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Curt Leake & Elm Tree Farm , LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Lt. Bonura
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 2wd, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Quest for Avette
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompt 2wd-3p btwn, led upr, outkicked 1/8, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Loveu and Proudofu
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed 3wd-4p, wknd btwn upr

ENTRY.NAME: Crusader Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 3p btw, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace 4p, 6p1/4, moved up/outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Production
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, tracked 4w-5p, rallied, bid 1/8, cleared, caught
